name: The ABC
description:
Special Thanks

This game is made from "SMILE GAME BUILDER".

https://store.steampowered.com/app/483950/SMILE_GAME_BUILDER/

Story

The story is Hee-chan's first encounter with Brahmanism while she was dreaming.


Actually Hee-chan didn't know about Brahmanism. It is Brahmana who had an eye on her because he was searching for a gate to another future. Brahmana smells cinders from Hee-chan's soul.
In his opinion, anyone's soul must have one or more entrances that is connected with alternative future.

Hee-chan


Brahmana

Game Feature

This game is not JRPG but Adventure Game.
Playgrounds are mainly separated in three parts.

  • Hidden Object Game


  • Tag Game


  • Block Play Game
